mapper.select: SELECT CMT.REQ_SEQ AS reqSeq , CMT.REQ_CMT_SEQ AS reqCmtSeq , CMT.REQ_CMT AS reqCmt , HIS.REQ_STAT_CD AS reqStatCd , FN_GET_CODE_NM('REQ_STAT_CD', HIS.REQ_STAT_CD) AS reqStat , CASE WHEN LOGIN.AUTH_SEQ = 1 OR LOGIN.USER_SEQ = CMT.REG_SEQ THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ownerYn , CMT.USE_YN AS useYn , DATE_FORMAT(CMT.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS regDt , FN_GET_USER_NM(CMT.REG_SEQ) AS regNm FROM TB_REQ_CMT CMT INNER JOIN TB_REQ_HIS HIS ON CMT.REQ_SEQ = HIS.REQ_SEQ AND CMT.REQ_HIS_SEQ = HIS.REQ_HIS_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_USER LOGIN ON LOGIN.USER_SEQ = #{loginUserSeq} WHERE (CASE WHEN LOGIN.AUTH_SEQ = 1 THEN TRUE ELSE CMT.USE_YN = 'Y' END) AND CMT.REQ_CMT_SEQ = #{reqCmtSeq}
